data.title: The Full Fibre Broadband Network
meta_keywords: EXPERIENCE 44x FASTER BROADBAND Join our brand new full fibre network for speeds up to 2.5 Gbps. Effortless performance and reliability. Say goodbye to copper cables and delays. Enter your postcode to start your full fibre journey.    BAD BROADBAND WEIGHING YOU DOWN?  Most of the UK is still struggling on with broadband that's "OK" at best. Part fibre networks

brought into our homes with old copper wires.  Our brand new network can reach up to 2.5 Gbps (that's 44 times faster than the broadband in most UK homes*).   And its five times more reliable - meaning less drop-outs
and less work calls that descend into a pixelated palaver.  * UK home broadband performance - Ofcom   zap Speeds up to 44x faster than the UK average*

on a network designed to be upgraded as soon as the technology is invented. loader Plans start from £24 a month and are up to £130 a year cheaper – despite being much faster and up to 5x more reliable.* tool Built-in intelligence lets us track and fix issues as they – and often before – they happen.    OUR NETWORK
YOUR CHOICE  Once our network is available in your area

you’ll be able to choose from a range of offers from our broadband providers. We only partner with providers who share our desire to build something incredible. You’ll also have the freedom to choose from over 30 broadband providers – so you can always find the best deal.  Full Fibre for everyone Our modern full fibre network already passes over 3.7 million premises across the UK.  About us We think full fibre has the potential to transform not only the British economy

but society as a whole.  For Homes Find out what it means to connect your home to the CityFibre network.  For Business Better broadband is the bedrock of businesses in the digital age. Join the companies already on our network.  Partner with us We’re challenging the UK broadband status quo
pushing for better for our broadband providers and their customers. Join us.  How can we help?
data.meta_description: CityFibre is a brand new full fibre network built for the data age. Never worry about speed or reliability again. Connect your home and business today.
data.text:
Most of the UK is still struggling on with broadband that's "OK" at best. Part fibre networks, brought into our homes with old copper wires.

Our brand new network can reach up to 2.5 Gbps (that's 44 times faster than the broadband in most UK homes*).

And its five times more reliable - meaning less drop-outs, less spinning wheels of death, and less work calls that descend into a pixelated palaver.

*UK home broadband performance - Ofcom

To report network build site health & safety concerns or damage to our network, call 0800 298 6267.

CityFibre is a fibre network provider and provides services on behalf of broadband providers. Residents with enquiries or issues related to home broadband services or installation, should contact their broadband provider directly for support.

To raise an issue about our network build or engineering staff or to search our FAQs use our digital messaging support.
